channel.title: Laurora Dolly Art
channel.description: Recent content on Laurora Dolly Art

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I’m Lora. I’m a clay sculptor and traditional artist. I’ve been interested in sculpting and drawing for as long as I can remember. Since I was a kid I dreamed about being able to create tiny friends which could follow me in my adventures. I get inspiration from everything cute and magical. I’m also very fond of nature so I always try to find more eco-friendly and sustainable materials. Working with cold porcelain is one of my favorite ways for making that possible.
